scripts.build: tsc && trash cdk.out && npm run cdk synth
scripts.cdk:destroy: npm run cdk destroy -- --app cdk.out $npm_config_stacks --role-arn=arn:aws:iam::$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text):role/exanubes-cloudformation-access
scripts.cdk:deploy: npm run cdk deploy -- --app cdk.out $npm_config_stacks --role-arn=arn:aws:iam::$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text):role/exanubes-cloudformation-access
